author: ken🥀
text: If your man cheats on you and you know he cheats, move on sis, he don’t respect you, you can do better.

author: ken🥀
text: I will never drop a friend just because we are both doing different things in life. People forget we are all growing and that doesn’t mean we have to put each other down. Encourage your friends to follow their dreams smh even if it’s not yours
